43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Miljaz:that Mu'awiyah came out and 'Abdullah bin Az-Zubair and Ibn Safwan stood for him when they saw him, so he said: "Sit, I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saying: 'Whoever wishes that he be received by men standing then, let him take his seat in the Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ قِيَامِ الرَّجُلِ لِلرَّجُلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked For A Man To Stand For Another Man
